item.title: CVE-2020-9055|2024-08-04T10:19:19.886Z -- versiant -- lynx%20customer%20service%20portal
item.description: Versiant LYNX Customer Service Portal (CSP), version 3.5.2, is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting, which could allow a local, authenticated attacker to insert malicious JavaScript that is stored and displayed to the end user. This could lead to website redirects, session cookie hijacking, or information disclosure.
